data.title: About EDU Chain
data.excerpt: EDU Chain links learning experiences with earning opportunities, making every step of the journey trackable on the blockchain. EDU Chain is the first L3 Blockchain built for Education.
data.description: EDU Chain links learning experiences with earning opportunities, making every step of the journey trackable on the blockchain. EDU Chain is the first L3 Blockchain built for Education.
